amendment.description: An amendment to increase funding for the Edward Byrne Memorial Justice Assistance Grant program by $532 million.

action.text: Mr. Wolf raised a point of order against the Kennedy (MN) amendment (A011). Mr. Wolf raised a point of order against the amendment stating that it proposed a net increase in discretionary spending in violation of section 302 F of the Congressional Budget Act of 1974. The Chair sustained the point of order.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A011) offered by Mr. Kennedy (MN).
